results.title: Thiazolidinediones and reduced risk of incident bacterial abscess in adults with type 2 diabetes: A population-based cohort study.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Rosiglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077154 @@@Rosiglitazone@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Pioglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077205 @@@pioglitazone@@@, in combination with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, produced similar reductions in risk of all @<m>DISEASE_Abscess</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000038 @@@abscess@@@ outcomes.

citations.NLM: Wang JL, Dong YH, Ko WC, Chang CH, Wu LC, Chuang LM, Chen PC. Thiazolidinediones and reduced risk of incident bacterial abscess in adults with type 2 diabetes: A population-based cohort study. Diabetes Obes Metab. 2018 Dec;20(12):2811-2820. PMID: 29974616
